description: This file defines feature flags for the application, encapsulating build configuration options such as whether to use mock data. It centralizes access to build-defined constants and handles fallback scenarios if the build config is not available.

classes.name: FeatureFlags
classes.description: Provides a centralized way to determine if mock data should be used, based on build configuration or fallback.

classes.name: BuildConfigHolder
classes.description: Wrapper class that safely accesses BuildConfig.generated fields, with fallback defaults if the generated class or fields are unavailable.

methods.name: useMocks
methods.description: Returns whether mocks are enabled, attempting to read from the BuildConfig class; defaults to true if inaccessible.
